dict.string: An account with this email address already exists.
There is no existed user with this email.
Invalid password. Password must consist of 8 to 16 characters with at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
Gender must be M or F.
Invalid date of birth. You must be of age 13 or older to register.
Email must conform to valid email format.
Lastname must consist of letters only.
Firstname must consist of letters only.
